pageContext.claim: “The ISIS caliphate has been totally destroyed, and its founder and leader, the animal known as Al-Baghdadi is dead. And crazy Nancy Pelosi said don't call him an animal, he's a human being. No, he's an animal. He's an animal.”
pageContext.analysis: Pelosi never said this about Baghdadi. Trump sometimes falsely claims that Pelosi once chided him for using the word "animals" to refer to members of the MS-13 gang. Now, apparently, the story involves a terrorist.
